title: Luck Potions
summaries: The Luck Potions are three types of potions which grant the Lucky buff, increasing the player's luck. This lasts for 5–15 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version]), or by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]).

The only difference between the three potions is the duration of the Lucky buff; however, the Lucky buff is unique in that its effect depends on the remaining duration. The Greater Luck Potion gives +0.3 luck for 5 minutes, followed by the equivalent of a "regular" Luck Potion (10 minutes). This in turn consists of 5 minutes of +0.2 luck, followed by the equivalent of the Lesser Luck Potion, which provides 5 minutes of +0.1 luck.
